resources.string: Phome is a small and beautifully designed helper app.\n\nPhome can inform you the missed calls and messages via E-mail when the phone is not with you. No more anxiety if you left your phone at home.
Please ensure SMTP service is available in your mailbox settings.
Phome will never collect your account and password.
Please select the mail server instead of input it.
A test mail is sending to your mailbox, please check it out.
Your device is not connected to the Internet, please check the device networking.
I\'m a test mail from Phome on your phone.
Great! Phome can inform you the missed calls and messages on your phone via this mailbox.
I\'m a confirmation mail from Phome on your phone.
You have just started the Phome notification service on your phone. Phome will inform you every call and message via E-mail with this mailbox.
Phome guess your phone is away from you. Email notification service is on.
If your phone is not with you, send a text message \"I left my phone\" to your phone to start the notification service. Meanwhile, you will get a confirmation mail in your mailbox.
